event.title: Conference: "Thoughts are free, and so is software", Dornbirn, Austria

body.p: On July 8, 2004, from 17:00 until 19:30, several speeches on Free Software topics will be held in the Competence Center Dornbirn (Austria). Among others, Reinhard MÃ¼ller will talk about basic concepts of Free Software. Admission is free.
